hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our platform

items.question: What is this platform?
items.answer: We provide a modern web development platform that helps you build, deploy, and scale applications faster. Our edge-first architecture ensures your users get the best possible experience.

items.question: Who is this for?
items.answer: Our platform is designed for developers, startups, and enterprises who want to build fast, reliable web applications without managing complex infrastructure.

items.question: How do I get started?
items.answer: Getting started is easy! Sign up for a free account, follow our quick-start guide, and deploy your first application in minutes. No credit card required.

items.question: Is there a free tier?
items.answer: Yes! Our free tier includes 100K requests per month, 10GB bandwidth, and access to all core features. Perfect for side projects and learning.

items.question: What technologies do you support?
items.answer: We support JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, Go, Rust, and more. Our platform runs on Cloudflare Workers, giving you access to a global edge network.

items.question: How does deployment work?
items.answer: Deploy with a single command or connect your Git repository for automatic deployments. Every push triggers a new build and deployment to our edge network.

items.question: Can I use my own domain?
items.answer: Yes! Custom domains are supported on all paid plans. We provide free SSL certificates and automatic HTTPS for all domains.

items.question: What about databases?
items.answer: We integrate with various databases including D1 (SQLite at the edge), KV storage, Durable Objects, and external databases like PostgreSQL and MongoDB.

items.question: How do you handle scaling?
items.answer: Our edge-first architecture scales automatically. Your code runs in 300+ locations worldwide, handling traffic spikes without any configuration.

items.question: How does billing work?
items.answer: We bill monthly based on your plan. Usage beyond your plan limits is charged at competitive overage rates. Enterprise customers can arrange custom billing.

items.question: Can I change plans?
items.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade at any time. Upgrades take effect immediately, and downgrades apply at your next billing cycle.

items.question: Do you offer refunds?
items.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for all paid plans. If you're not satisfied, contact support for a full refund.

items.question: Are there any hidden fees?
items.answer: No hidden fees. Our pricing is transparent and predictable. You only pay for what you use beyond your plan limits.

items.question: How can I get help?
items.answer: We offer multiple support channels: documentation, community forums, email support (Pro plans), and 24/7 phone support (Enterprise plans).

items.question: What's your response time?
items.answer: Community support: best effort. Email support: within 24 hours. Enterprise support: within 1 hour for critical issues.

items.question: Do you have documentation?
items.answer: Yes! We have comprehensive documentation including tutorials, API references, examples, and troubleshooting guides. Visit /docs to explore.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Security is our top priority. We use industry-standard encryption, regular security audits, and follow best practices for data protection.

items.question: What compliance certifications do you have?
items.answer: We're SOC 2 Type II certified and GDPR compliant. Enterprise customers can request additional compliance documentation.

items.question: Where is my data stored?
items.answer: Your code and data are distributed across our global edge network. You can configure data residency requirements for compliance needs.

contact.title: Still have questions?
contact.description: Can't find what you're looking for? Our team is happy to help.
